name: Edgy Hood
description:
A young girl decides to run away from an Asylum. Switching Quickly between the Two States of your Character is the key to beat the obstacles she faces.
What is the cost of such freedom?

[A/LeftArrow] & [D/RightArrow] Movement 

[SpaceBar] Change Character State + Interact

Credits:

Alon Yairi - 2D Art
Layan Metanes - Dev & 2D Art
Liron Rotman - Dev & 3D Art
